objects.name: Analytic 0362
objects.description: Modification of plist files to set apple.awt.UIElement or similar flags hiding app icons and windows, and dscl/command-line activity that suppresses visibility. Defender view: correlation of plist modifications with unexpected hidden user applications.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Modification of plist with apple.awt.UIElement set to TRUE

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of Java apps or other processes with hidden window attributes

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Restrict detection to application plists where UIElement flag is unexpected.
Correlate plist modifications with the creating/modifying user to tune results.
